name: Trash Hook (RafPlayz69YT)
description:
Trash Hook A game made for #SEAJAM.

In this game, you fish for trash that idiots put in the ocean. As a fisherman, you decide to save the ocean, one trash at a time!

My video for this:

Epic Features:
  1. Has a script to get your country's currency symbol! (Note: using a VPN will mess with it and on web it will show dollar sign :/ due to backup if error)
  2. Has save data (Only in downloaded version)
